```js
d3.select('rect')
  .transition().style('fill', 'red').attr('x', 200)
  .transition().attr('y', 200)
```

```js
rect.transition()
    .style('fill', 'red')
    .each('start', function () { console.log("stahp, you're making me blush"); })
    .each('end', function () { console.log("crap, I'm all red now"); })
```

```js
d3.select('svg')
    .append('text')
    .attr({x: 100, y: 100})
    .text("I'm growing!")
    .transition()
    .styleTween('font', function () {
      return d3.interpolate('12px Helvetica', '36px Comic Sans MS');
```

```js
var width = 1024,
  height = 768,
  svg = d3.select('#graph')
    .append('svg')
    .attr({width: width,
           height: height});
```

```js
svg.append('text')
    .text(ease)
    .attr({x: 10,
        y: y(ease)+5});
```

```js
var width = 1200,
  height = 450,
  svg = d3.select('#graph')
    .append('svg')
    .attr({width: width,
           height: height});
```

```js
svg.append('image')
  .attr({'xlink:href': 'parallax_base.png',
          width: width,
          height: height});
```

```js
svg.append('g')
  .selectAll('line')
  .data(lines)
  .enter()
  .append('line')
  .style('shape-rendering', 'crispEdges')
  .attr({stroke: 'black',
        'stroke-width': x.rangeBand()-1,
         x1: function (d) { return x(d); },
         y1: 0,
         x2: function (d) { return x(d); },
         y2: height});
```

```js
svg.select('g')
  .datum({x: 0, y: 0})
  .call(drag);
```

```js
var x = d3.scale.linear()
    .range([50, width-50]),
  y = d3.scale.linear()
    .range([height-50, 50]);

svg.append('g')
  .classed('circles', true)
  .selectAll('circle')
  .data(data)
  .enter()
  .append('circle')
  .attr({cx: function (d) { return x(d.x); },
         cy: function (d) { return y(d.y); },
         r: 4});
```

```js
svg.append('g')
  .classed('axis', true)
  .attr('transform', 'translate(50, 0)')
  .call(d3.svg.axis().orient('left').scale(y));

svg.append('g')
  .classed('axis', true)
  .attr('transform', 'translate(0, '+(height-50)+')')
  .call(d3.svg.axis().orient('bottom').scale(x));
```

```js
svg.append("g")
  .classed("brush", true)
  .call(d3.svg.brush().x(x).y(y)
  .on("brushstart", brushstart)
  .on("brush", brushmove)
  .on("brushend", brushend));
```
